tool_description: Get financial data such as stock, ETFs and Cryptocurrencies, especially dividends history
name: OXINION Finance
title: OXINION Finance

api_list.name: Get individual stock's details
api_list.description:
Get individual stock's details
/stocks/:symbol
In {symbol}, please use in a lower letter

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Accept only lower letter at this moment

api_list.name: Get all cryptocurrencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oxinion-finance.p.rapidapi.com/cryptocurrencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oxinion-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
